name: VR- Visit Haunted House 3D Free
description:
A vr haunted house, with hungry dragon and scary zombie and an extreme 3d view are awaiting. Get ready for their attacks with and except the real challenge of scary house. The only way to get rid from the attacks of the zombies and hungry dragon is to escape from the scary house and save your life with a real fun of virtual reality by using your cardboard glasses.

Features:
A real mode of virtual reality in scary house. Face a real challenge of haunted house. Stunning sound effects and hd graphics. Hungry dragon are ready to catch you. Escape from the attack of zombie.
